name: "Oh it's Such A Perfect Day" - Lou Reed
description: Having lived in Dubai for the majority of my life, I can confidently say that well.. I know what's circulating 'round and the quality spots. Over the years, my idea of 'a good time' has changed - I've been through physical activities and hanging around malls to shisha joints and clubs and then to lounges and more intimate scenery.. Basically - depending on what you prefer, I probably have a good place in mind but if you put your faith in me and my perception of a Perfect Day:
